<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Enormous Flame Drake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2234)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet, smoke vision

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** Smoke doesn't impair a flame drake's vision; it ignores [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 140

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> fangs only.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +20,
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus 1d8 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning

**Draconic Frenzy** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The flame drake Strikes twice with its fangs and once with its tail in any order.

**Fireball Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The flame drake expels a ball of flame to a range of 180 feet that explodes in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the burst take 9d6 fire damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The flame drake can't use Fireball Breath again for 1d6 rounds.

**Speed Surge** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Frequency** three times per day; **Effect** The flame drake Strides or Flies up to twice its Speed.

</column>
name: Enormous Flame Drake
